title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/NPL
author: oeyoews
name: NPL
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/NPL/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/NPL/readme","description":"~NPL","text":"!! Npl

> 插件库展示仍然有bug(但是tiddlers.json 文件都是正常生成的), 如果插件生成的json(一般是readme导致的问题, 或者是图片的格式tid问题)加入了一些特殊符号会导致请求失败, 插件库也无法加载, 目前没有什么好的排查办法,排查较为耗时, 不再构建并维护NPL插件库 2023/09/25
> 调试可以使用本地插件库测试, 但暂时没这个打算测试bug, nodejs的tw, 我自己主要还是使用文件夹的形式配合脚本动态管理插件

已修复: https://github.com/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-starter-kit/issues/104

!! TODO

library/index.html 重新做一个展示插件列表的区域,就像在tw里面的插件列表"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/NPL/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/NPL/icon","text":"<svg stroke="currentColor" fill="#aaa" stroke-width="0" viewBox="0 0 24 24" height="1em" width="1em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M7 3h2v18H7zM4 3h2v18H4zm6 0h2v18h-2zm9.062 17.792-6.223-16.89 1.877-.692 6.223 16.89z"></path></svg>
","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/NPL":{"title":"$:/NPL","description":"Tiddlywiki Starter Kit Plugin Library","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"TSKPL","url":"https://tiddlywiki-starter-kit.vercel.app/library/index.html","text":"Tiddlywiki Starter Kit Plugin Library

<!-- 源
https://oeyoews.github.io
顶级网站
http://127.0.0.1
属于第三方
是，因为相应源不属于该顶级网站

github 禁止跨域,(仅支持https) 还是需要vercel
 -->
"}}}
